website_summaries.verdict: Pack of 2 lightweight caps available in three colors. High marks for being comfortable on the forehead area.
pros: Impressive elasticity and many reports that caps can handle a lot of wear before they need replacing
Color assortment is more natural than assortments in competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Came in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Came in good condition, no problem with the seller. But the wig cap is definitely not jumbo. It's not even normal size. It may just be the smallest tightest wig cap I've ever tried on and my head is average sized. I have my natural hair in flat cornrows, not super thick. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Best wig cap for dark skin women
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap keeps my frontal looking realistic and the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Dominek

customer_reviews.title: Wig cap
customer_reviews.text: A little tight. Sort of gives me a headache after a while, but works well. May slplit one side with scissors
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This color actually worked for me! As a dark-skinned person, it's hard to find stocking caps that match my tone.
customer_reviews.author: Lashea Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Timeliness and quality
customer_reviews.text: What's important to me is quality but it must be delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Buy a lot of these, they fit perfect, the elastic in them takes a long time to ware out
customer_reviews.author: j.g1998

customer_reviews.title: Stocking cap
customer_reviews.text: The color is great but the cap is to thick for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Carter

customer_reviews.title: Protects...
customer_reviews.text: My naturals and in case my wigs get snatched you will see this cap 😱
customer_reviews.author: Janelle-Jocelyn Garringer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only came with one cap when the advertisement says 2
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Cheating you out ur money
customer_reviews.text: I love these wig caps but not worth 3.99 for one when in the beauty supply stores there a 99 cent
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Tamer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do whenever I wear my wig
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fit my big head, snug and solid color!
customer_reviews.text: Happy I found some brown wig caps that fit my larger ish head super snug. Great great choice
customer_reviews.author: Aidah

customer_reviews.title: No caps in package
customer_reviews.text: SMHHHHHH I open the packaging to find zero wig caps. I’m so confused because it was a sealed package but I open it to no product.
customer_reviews.author: TriniGirl22

customer_reviews.title: More for darker tone
customer_reviews.text: Good for a darker skin tone, helps with the lace
customer_reviews.author: Nyomi

customer_reviews.title: Great Wig Cap
customer_reviews.text: The cap is of good quality, great color cap for brown and dark skin ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not the best wig cap
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this for a sew in then you may be ok. However I found that the cap did not work well with glue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin tone match for chocolate women
customer_reviews.text: It’s fits my exact skin tone so that’s a plus
customer_reviews.author: nikhol

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Snug and comfortable. Was easy to blend in. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: The stocking wig cap fits just right and tight it’s what I need for my bald cap method. Loose caps usually flap up even after laying down your frontal, tight caps hold it down for real!
customer_reviews.author: Camila Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Buy yours you won't regret
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy at first but when I received it's as exactly as what I saw on the picture....good material ...I love it
customer_reviews.author: Faith Chimaliro

customer_reviews.title: Good for protection of the hair underneath the wig.
customer_reviews.text: Wig caps are not to tight on the head. The color is perfect and blends well with the wigs.
customer_reviews.author: KIMO

customer_reviews.title: Not for medium to large heads
customer_reviews.text: Way too small with no stretch. I have a lot of hair and even when it's braided, it's still thick. This cap was painfully tight.
customer_reviews.author: Allison J

product_meta.title: Red by Kiss Wig Cap (Stocking Cap, Dark Brown)
